about.dataprivacy: The information on NC COVID Support has been gathered from public web sources by volunteers or entered by business owners/resource providers. The data are provided to assist the public, local businesses, government partners, and non-profits during the COVID-19 pandemic. The data should not be used for commercial ventures or other purposes without the express permission of NC COVID Support.

about.info: Our database of resources benefits from information collected by these organizations:
about.title: About this site

faq.title: Info about free meals
faq.staySafeReminder: Please be sure to wear a mask when visiting a pickup site or interacting with volunteers to help us all stay safe!
faq.whatWeDoQuestion: What does Food for Students do?
faq.whatWeDoAnswer:
We help to connect kids and families with meals in their area.
 We know that School-sponsored meals are a lifeline for many kids and families during the COVID crisis. And now that the school year had ended, many school districts are offering families free meals through their summer program. We're here to help you find them.
faq.freeMealsQuestion: How can I get free meals?
faq.freeMealsAnswer: You can use our mapping tool to find meals close to you. Click on a distribution site to view its address and operating hours, then pick up free meals in that window.
faq.helpAnswer-start:
If you would help us spread the word so everyone has access to our meals, we would be so grateful. Share our meal site on social media and text your friends!  Let's get everyone excited about Food For Students!
Please also consider donating to the
faq.helpAnswer-end: so the program can continue as long as it is needed.
